description: The course explains the whole procedure of obtaining residence permit of Turkey-starting with the information about most popular types ( family, touristic, student) and ending with renewal and some specific intelligence like renewal, cancellation, application form, etc. We also present the information concerning health insurance, bank accounts and post service. The videos include presentations and PDF format downloadable documents, the course lasts approximately 2 hours. The whole course is divided into series of videos according to the type of residence permit where there are such subtopics like what is it, what are the necessary documents, cancellation, renewal and so on. If you are a foreigner who wants to get residence permit and does not know where to start from, this course is definitely for you!!!
title: Residence Permit of Turkey
